scripts.build: npm run build:jade && npm run build:stylus && npm run build:jekyll && npm run build:scripts && npm run doiuse
scripts.build:jade: npm run build:jade:includes && npm run build:jade:layouts
scripts.build:stylus: npm run build:stylus:compile && npm run build:stylus:prefix
scripts.build:stylus:prefix: (cd _styles/unprefixed && for file in *.css; do (postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'ie >= 9, > 1%, last 2 versions, ios >= 7' < *.css   | csso > ../../css/$file); done)
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:scripts:compile && npm run build:scripts:uglify
scripts.build:scripts:uglify: (cd js && for file in *; do (uglifyjs -c -m -o $file $file); done)
scripts.watch: npm run watch:jekyll & npm run watch:jade -s & npm run watch:styles -s & npm run watch:scripts -s & npm run browser-sync
scripts.watch:jade: npm run watch:jade:includes && npm run watch:jade:layouts
scripts.watch:stylus: npm run watch:stylus:compile && npm run watch:stylus:prefix
scripts.watch:stylus:prefix: watch '(cd _styles/unprefixed && for file in *.css; do (postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'ie >= 9, > 1%, last 2 versions, ios >= 7' < *.css   | csso > ../../css/$file); done)' _styles/unprefixed
scripts.watch:scripts: watch 'npm run watch:scripts:compile && npm run watch:scripts:uglify' _scripts
scripts.watch:scripts:uglify: (cd js && for file in *; do (uglifyjs -c -m -o $file $file); done)
